key.name: default-install-mode
key.description: Controls how AppManager installs AppImages when the user does not explicitly override the mode. The values are “portable” or “extracted”.

key.name: auto-clean-temp
key.description: When enabled AppManager removes temporary directories immediately after finishing extraction.

key.name: use-system-icons
key.description: If enabled, AppManager strips absolute icon file paths in generated desktop files and references icon names instead.

key.name: remember-drop-window-position
key.description: If enabled, AppManager reopens the drop window at the last screen coordinates.

key.name: window-width
key.description: Stores the last known width so the preferences window can restore it.

key.name: window-height
key.description: Stores the last known height so the preferences window can restore it.
